English.Name: [M:I1]Pounce Orb
English.ShortDescription: Makes user leap to a wall.
English.LongDescription:
An item that makes the user pounce
toward the first Pokémon in its line of
sight, no matter how distant. If there
are no Pokémon in that direction, the
user leaps to the wall.

[BAR]
Range:[CLUM_SET:36] Special
